subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. suspended the Green Bay Packers’ Johnny Jolly without pay for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy, and Michael Selvie, convicted in a shooting, was sentenced to 55 years in prison.
snippet: The N.F.L. suspended the Green Bay Packers’ Johnny Jolly without pay for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy, and Michael Selvie, convicted in a shooting, was sentenced to 55 years in prison.
